name: Offline Mode warning
description: Warning that the server is running in offline mode allowing unauthenticated users to play on the server.
author: Vachan MN
response:
This is only a warning that says your server allows cracked players to join
This is not favorable if you want only premium players to join!

To remove this warning set `online-mode` to `true` in your server.properties file.
keywords: SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE MODE
